name: Good Night
description:
Read after playing (spoiler alert):

So I'm just gonna explain some stuff that I was trying to do with the game.

You wake up with an alarm that you have to click once, if done succesfully you will spend less time at bed and manage to wake up at your time to go to work. If you lose time, you won't be able to do some things since you lost time. 

The shower it's there so you can read the note after taking it. Makes sense to me.

After that you can face your boss or get to work. You won't have this possibility unless you are late.

If you read the note you go have launch with them but it ends up beings something different.

The ending it's supposed to be a (they are crazy and they own me). (Yeah, kind of like a yandere).

If people actually enjoy this I will make a bunch of improvements like adding more sounds and images. And if somehow people love this I can try to do the crazy idea that I started with

If you actually played and read everything you are a fucking beast. Much love
